trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 显示的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You typically use the ContentPresenter in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to specify where the content is to be added.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用在 ContentPresenter<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>指定其中的内容是要添加。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type has a ContentPresenter in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>类型具有其默认情况下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> ContentPresenter</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When a ContentPresenter object is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 当 ContentPresenter 对象处于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>属性以获取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>的相同名称的属性及其值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: You can have the ContentPresenter property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property or binding to them.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置从模板化父级的其他属性来获取这些属性的值的 ContentPresenter 属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>属性或绑定到它们。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ContentPresenter uses the following logic to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: ContentPresenter 使用以下逻辑来显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>:-如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>ContentPresenter 上的属性设置，则 ContentPresenter 适用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>属性以及产生<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>并显示其子元素，如果有的话，。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>对象，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>ContentPresenter 属性设置，ContentPresenter 适用相应<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>属性以及产生<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>并显示其子元素，如果有的话，。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associated with the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果没有<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>的一种与关联<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>，ContentPresenter 适用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>属性以及产生<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>并显示其子元素，如果有的话，。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>显示。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already has a parent, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>已经有父级，则会发生异常。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果没有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>，用于将转换的类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，ContentPresenter 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>以及产生<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>显示。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain that string.
trans-unit.target: -如果没有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>，用于将转换的类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>化为一个字符串，ContentPresenter 将使用该<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>并创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>以包含该字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>显示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: - If the content is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property is displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: -如果内容是是<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement><xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>中一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>显示属性</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>的值</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: - The ContentPresenter calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain the string returned by <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -ContentPresenter 调用<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>，并创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>包含<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>返回的字符串</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A></xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>显示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Positions the single child element and determines the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 定位单个子元素并确定的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The size that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object should use to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: 大小此<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>对象为排列其子元素应使用。

trans-unit.source: The actual size needed by the element.
trans-unit.target: 所需元素的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns the template to use.
trans-unit.target: 返回要使用的模板。

trans-unit.source: This may depend on the content or other properties.
trans-unit.target: 这可能取决于内容或其他属性。

trans-unit.source: The base class implements the following rules: 1.
trans-unit.target: 基类实现以下规则︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is set, use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>设置，则使用它。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> is set, call its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>设置时，调用其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the result is not `null`, use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果不为`null`，使用它。

trans-unit.source: Look for a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> whose <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> matches the content among the resources known to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (including application, theme, and system resources).
trans-unit.target: 查找<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>其<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>已知的资源之间内容匹配<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>（包括应用程序、 主题和系统资源）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If one is found, use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一个对象，使用它。

trans-unit.source: If the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is "common", use a standard template.
trans-unit.target: 如果的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>是"common"，使用标准模板。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The common types are `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 常见类型如下`String`， <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>，和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，请使用的默认模板，实质上是将转换<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>为字符串并将其显示在一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以重写这些规则并实现其自己。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used to generate the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于生成的子元素的数据<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you place a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, it automatically displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the templated control.
trans-unit.target: 当你将放置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，它会自动显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的模板化控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: This means that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is implicitly bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is using that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>隐式绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，使用了该<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>的内容属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>设置

trans-unit.source: To set up bindings for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> properties, you may want to consider using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将设置绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>属性，你可能需要考虑使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>属性指向上模板化父级以及别名的属性关联的模板和模板选择器属性自动。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况通常情况下，使用`TemplateBinding`将此属性的值绑定上模板化控件的值。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The data used to generate the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成的子元素的数据。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在自动命名别名过程中使用的基名称。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is in a template.
trans-unit.target: 只应为此属性时使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>模板中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: When a template contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> with ContentSource set to "`Abc`", the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果模板包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>与 ContentSource 设置为"`Abc`"，则<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>会自动化名为`Abc`， `AbcTemplate`，和`AbcTemplateSelector`分别。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting ContentSource to "`Abc`" also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]，将 ContentSource 设置为"`Abc`"也会导致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>属性化名为`AbcStringFormat`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header".
trans-unit.target: 此属性的两个最有用值为"内容"和"标头"。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 要在自动命名别名过程中使用的基名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Content".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"内容"。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>属性，如果它显示为一个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，ContentStringFormat 属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为**true**|None |

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>属性，如果它显示为一个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示控件的内容的模板。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用对于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that defines the visualization of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> ，它定义的内容的可视化效果。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>, which allows the application writer to provide custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>，这样，要选择用于显示控件的内容的模板提供自定义逻辑的应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用对于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that supplies logic to return a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>提供逻辑来返回的对象<xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>应用。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object based on the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of the child content.
trans-unit.target: 确定的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>对象根据大小属性、 边距和请求的子内容的大小。

trans-unit.source: An upper limit value that the return value should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: 返回值不应超过上限值。

trans-unit.source: The size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: 排列子内容所需大小。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> property changes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> should use <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> in its style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>应使用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>其样式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> property on instances of this class.
